dependencies.description:
Jinja2 is a template engine written in pure Python. It provides a Django
inspired non-XML syntax but supports inline expressions and an optional
sandboxed environment.
dependencies.name: py-jinja2

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
A convenient way to expose an extensible API with enforced method
signatures and consistent documentation.
dependent_to.name: py-interface-meta

dependent_to.description: Poetry plugin used to tweak dependency versions.
dependent_to.name: py-poetry-plugin-tweak-dependencies-version

dependent_to.description: Sphinx directive to add unselectable prompt.
dependent_to.name: py-sphinx-prompt

description: Plugin for Poetry to enable dynamic versioning based on VCS tags.
name: py-poetry-dynamic-versioning

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
